title: The Art of Murder
description: Wales at its best.  The second in the Jordan Jenner Mysteries series. The follow up to Murder on the Rocks.  Artist Xander Draper is being threatened by a dangerous group. With PI Jordan Jenner's help, Xander hopes to remain unscathed.  But when Xander is murdered, his body displayed as his final exhibit, Jordan realises the extent of the trouble Xander was in. Now, there are people following Jordan. They know his name, and they want him dead.  Meanwhile, Jordan's brother Ashley has returned, and he has a secret. As time runs out to solve the murder of the famous artist, Jordan begins to fear his brother may be responsible.  A classic cosy mystery set in the heart of Cardiff.  A perfect read for fans of Agatha Christie.  A murdered artist. A brother with a deadly secret. A group intent on killing. The Art of Murder is the second in the Jordan Jenner Mysteries series, a cosy murder mystery set in Wales.
author: J.S. Strange
